mapper.sql: select city_sample_test_details_id, sample_code, veg_fru_name, sampling_location, detect_location, sampling_quantity, sampling_base, sampling_stage_type, sampling_date, china_standard, cac_standard, japan_standard, eu_standard, us_standard, korea_standard, created_at from agri_city_sample_test_details
mapper.select: select a.enterprise_name, a.enterprise_attribute, a.enterprise_credit_id_code, a.tracing_province, a.tracing_city, a.tracing_county, a.tracing_area, a.sampling_location_province, a.sampling_location_city, a.sampling_location_county, a.city_sample_test_details_id, a.sample_code, a.veg_fru_name, a.sampling_location, a.detect_location, a.sampling_quantity, a.sampling_base, a.sampling_stage_type, a.sampling_date, a.china_standard, a.cac_standard, a.japan_standard, a.eu_standard, a.us_standard, a.korea_standard, a.created_at, a.all_district_code, b.pesticide_det_result_id as sub_pesticide_det_result_id, b.pesticide_name as sub_pesticide_name, b.pesticide_det_value as sub_pesticide_det_value, b.city_sample_test_details_id as sub_city_sample_test_details_id, b.created_at as sub_created_at from agri_city_sample_test_details a left join agri_pesticide_det_result b on b.city_sample_test_details_id = a.city_sample_test_details_id where a.city_sample_test_details_id = #{citySampleTestDetailsId}
SELECT dept_name FROM sys_user JOIN sys_dept ON sys_dept.`dept_id` = sys_user.`dept_id` WHERE user_name = #{userName}
mapper.insert:
insert into agri_city_sample_test_details
sample_code, veg_fru_name, sampling_location, detect_location, sampling_quantity, sampling_base, sampling_stage_type, sampling_date, china_standard, cac_standard, japan_standard, eu_standard, us_standard, korea_standard, created_at, sampling_location_province, sampling_location_city, sampling_location_county, enterprise_name, enterprise_attribute, enterprise_credit_id_code, tracing_province, tracing_city, tracing_county, tracing_area, user_name, batch_id, sampling_type,
#{sampleCode}, #{vegFruName}, #{samplingLocation}, #{detectLocation}, #{samplingQuantity}, #{samplingBase}, #{samplingStageType}, #{samplingDate}, #{chinaStandard}, #{cacStandard}, #{japanStandard}, #{euStandard}, #{usStandard}, #{koreaStandard}, #{createdAt}, #{samplingLocationProvince}, #{samplingLocationCity}, #{samplingLocationCounty}, #{enterpriseName}, #{enterpriseAttribute}, #{enterpriseCreditIdCode}, #{tracingProvince}, #{tracingCity}, #{tracingCounty}, #{tracingArea}, #{userName}, #{batchId}, #{samplingType},

mapper.insert:
insert into agri_pesticide_det_result( pesticide_det_result_id, pesticide_name, pesticide_det_value, city_sample_test_details_id, created_at) values
